about_the_game:
Who am I? To find the answer, talk to people, learn words, and unlock new conversations

Who Am I Error Code: 99 is such a game.

To know yourself, talk to others.

Click the icons displayed on the map to converse with people.
Someone out there might know who you are.

Learn words and discover new conversations.

Save words that appear in conversations and try talking to other people.
You might receive a different answer this time.

You can remember up to three words.

Choose the necessary words carefully.
Because of your injuries, you can't remember too many words.

What's beyond the conversations...

This world is distorted.
To regain your memories, you might face great suffering.

Are you ready for that?

content_descriptors.notes: Please note that this work contains violent and sexual elements and expressions.

fullgame.name: Who Am I エラーコード：九十九

name: Who Am I エラーコード：九十九 Demo
short_description: When I woke up, I found myself in an unfamiliar place. Unknown streets, unknown people, an unfamiliar sky. Where am I? Who am I? In search of answers, the protagonist wanders through the city of desire and despair, "Toan."
